workflow.name: Automate Instagram engagement & sentiment analysis with GPT-4 and Slack reports
workflow.description:
## üìä Description
Automatically analyze your Instagram posts‚Äô engagement and audience sentiment using GPT-4 to uncover top-performing content and improvement opportunities. üí¨üìà
 This workflow fetches your latest Instagram posts using the Facebook Graph API, evaluates likes, comments, and tone, then generates structured performance insights. The results are logged into Google Sheets, shared via Slack alerts, and emailed through Outlook ‚Äî empowering your social media team with daily, AI-powered engagement intelligence. üöÄ

## What This Template Does
1Ô∏è‚É£ Trigger ‚Äì Runs daily at 10 AM to fetch the latest Instagram posts. ‚è∞
 2Ô∏è‚É£ Data Fetching ‚Äì Uses the Facebook Graph API to extract post data, captions, likes, and comments. üì≤
 3Ô∏è‚É£ Formatting ‚Äì Cleans and structures post and comment data for analysis. üß©
 4Ô∏è‚É£ AI Evaluation ‚Äì GPT-4 analyzes engagement metrics and comment sentiment to score post performance. ü§ñ
 5Ô∏è‚É£ Decision Routing ‚Äì Flags high- and low-performing posts for separate processing. ‚öôÔ∏è
 6Ô∏è‚É£ Notifications ‚Äì Sends positive performance summaries or negative alerts to Slack. üí¨
 7Ô∏è‚É£ Logging ‚Äì Records engagement metrics, sentiment labels, and AI recommendations in Google Sheets. üìä
 8Ô∏è‚É£ Reporting ‚Äì Emails detailed performance summaries to the marketing team via Outlook. üíå

## Key Benefits
‚úÖ Automates social performance tracking across Instagram posts
 ‚úÖ Provides AI-driven sentiment and engagement insights
 ‚úÖ Flags top or underperforming content for immediate action
 ‚úÖ Delivers Slack and email reports for team visibility
 ‚úÖ Centralizes analytics in Google Sheets for trend tracking

## Features
- Facebook Graph API integration for Instagram post and comment retrieval
- GPT-4 sentiment and engagement evaluation
- Structured JSON insights and recommendations
- Slack alerts for both positive and negative performance
- Google Sheets data logging with trend metrics
- Outlook email reporting for management visibility
- Customizable scheduling and thresholds

## Requirements
- Facebook Graph API credentials connected to your Instagram Business account
- OpenAI API key for GPT-4 or GPT-4o-mini
- Slack Bot token with chat:write permissions
- Google Sheets OAuth2 credentials with edit rights
- Microsoft Outlook OAuth2 credentials for email delivery
- Optional environment variables for IDs:
- SHEET_ID, SLACK_CHANNEL_ID, OUTLOOK_EMAIL

## Target Audience
1. Marketing and social media teams optimizing engagement üì£
2. Agencies managing multiple Instagram accounts üßë‚Äçüíº
3. Analysts tracking performance metrics and audience tone üìä
4. Brands automating daily performance reports üìÖ

## Step-by-Step Setup Instructions
1Ô∏è‚É£ Connect your Facebook Graph API to your Instagram Business Account.
 2Ô∏è‚É£ Add OpenAI API credentials (use GPT-4 model for best results).
 3Ô∏è‚É£ Configure Slack for team notifications and specify the channel ID.
 4Ô∏è‚É£ Link Google Sheets and set your sheet ID for data logging.
 5Ô∏è‚É£ Connect Microsoft Outlook for daily performance email reports.
 6Ô∏è‚É£ Adjust the schedule (default: 10 AM daily) to suit your workflow.
 7Ô∏è‚É£ Run a test once, verify data mapping, and enable automation. ‚úÖ

workflow.name: Automate Instagram Engagement & Sentiment Analysis with GPT-4 and Slack Reports

parameters.text:
=Analyze the following Instagram posts and their audience engagement metrics.

Posts JSON:
{{ JSON.stringify($json) }}

For each post, consider:
- Post caption, media type, likes, comments_count, total_engagement
- The sentiment and content of comments
- How positive/negative reactions might affect performance

Return your analysis strictly in JSON format:

{
  "summary": {
    "totalPostsAnalyzed": number,
    "averageEngagement": number,
    "topPerformingPostId": string,
    "topPerformanceReason": string
  },
  "posts": [
    {
      "post_id": string,
      "post_url": string,
      "caption": string,
      "likes": number,
      "comments_count": number,
      "total_engagement": number,
      "engagementScore": number,
      "commentSentiment": {
        "averageScore": number,
        "label": string,
        "positiveComments": [string],
        "negativeComments": [string]
      },
      "performanceLabel": string,
      "insight": string,
      "recommendation": string
    }
  ],
  "overallInsights": {
    "contentPatterns": [string],
    "engagementInsights": [string],
    "recommendations": [string]
  }
}

options.systemMessage:
=You are an AI Instagram Performance Analyst.  
Your goal is to evaluate the performance of multiple Instagram posts using both quantitative engagement data and qualitative comment sentiment.

Analyze each post considering:
- Likes, comments count, and total engagement
- The tone of comments (positive, neutral, negative)
- Caption style and media type
- Audience interaction patterns

Then identify which post performed best overall, explain why, and provide content strategy recommendations.  
Be analytical and specific ‚Äî avoid generic comments.  
Always respond strictly in **valid JSON** format with no extra text.

parameters.content:
## üß© Social Engagement Analyzer

### How it works
This workflow automates social media post performance tracking for Instagram. It pulls recent posts via the Graph API, analyzes engagement and comment sentiment using OpenAI GPT-4o, identifies top or underperforming content, and sends alerts or summaries to Slack, Outlook, and Google Sheets.

The flow includes AI-driven sentiment classification, engagement scoring, and actionable recommendations ‚Äî giving your marketing team a full engagement report each day automatically.

### Setup steps
1. Connect your **Facebook Graph API** to your Instagram Business account.  
2. Add **OpenAI** credentials and keep the model as `gpt-4o`.  
3. Connect your **Slack workspace**, **Outlook**, and **Google Sheets** accounts.  
4. Set the **Schedule Trigger** (e.g., daily at 10 AM).  
5. Adjust the **Switch node** conditions if you want custom sentiment labels.  
6. Run once manually to verify connections and data flow.

## üß† AI Sentiment & Engagement Analysis  

Analyzes likes, comments, and caption tone using GPT-4o. Generates structured JSON insights identifying performance patterns, sentiment scores, and improvement recommendations.

## üí¨ Team Notifications  


Sends automated performance updates and alerts via Slack and Outlook. Positive posts share insights; negative ones trigger a ‚ÄúPerformance Alert‚Äù to your team.

## ‚öôÔ∏è Sentiment Decision Logic  


Evaluates AI output to decide next actions: positive results route to performance reporting, negative results trigger alerts to Slack and email.

## ‚è∞ Data Fetch & Preparation  

This section triggers the workflow on schedule, fetches Instagram posts using the Graph API, and formats them into clean, analyzable JSON data.

## üìä Log Analytics to Google Sheets  


Flattens and saves all engagement and sentiment metrics into Google Sheets for trend tracking and data-driven decisions.

## üîê Credentials & Security  


Use OAuth2 for Slack, Google Sheets, and Outlook.  
API keys for OpenAI and Graph API only.  
Avoid storing personal or business emails in shared templates.

user.bio: Rahul Joshi is a seasoned technology leader specializing in the n8n automation tool and AI-driven workflow automation. With deep expertise in building open-source workflow automation and self-hosted automation platforms, he helps organizations eliminate manual processes through intelligent n8n ai agent automation solutions.
